summary: This bill, S.1533, aims to make permanent and codify the existing pilot program that allows the Department of Veterans Affairs to utilize contract physicians for disability examinations. It adds a new section to Title 38, United States Code, detailing the authority, licensure requirements, funding sources, and mechanism for transmitting new medical evidence. The bill also terminates the original pilot program and mandates a report to Congress on the impact of this expanded program on cost, timeliness, and thoroughness of exams.
